long_description: Made for easy use with smaller-wheeled bikes, our Novara Schrader tube replaces leaky or worn-out tubes for tire sizes 12.5 x 1.75 - 2.25 in.. 35mm Schrader valve is bent for easier access on smaller wheels. Please note: this tube works with Schrader-compatible rims. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
